title: Old Habits
description: Melissa Marr returns to the ravishing world of Faerie with a story set between her bestselling novels Ink Exchange and Fragile Eternity.Recently anointed king of the Dark Court, Niall struggles to forge a new relationship with his subjectsâ€”and with the former Dark King, Irial, his once-friend, once-enemy, and now possible-advisor.
author: Melissa Marr
